name: Weedle
flavorText:
Often found in
forests, eating
leaves. It has a sharp
venomous stinger
on its head.

previous.name: Butterfree
previous.flavorText:
In battle, it
flaps its wings
at high speed to release highly
toxic dust into
the air.

next.name: Kakuna
next.flavorText:
Almost incapable
of moving, this
POKéMON can only harden its shell
to protect itself
from predators.

pokemon.name: Beedrill
pokemon.flavorText:
It has three poisonous stingers on its forelegs and
its tail. They are used to jab its enemy repeatedly.
